verses.verse: וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said לָ֖הּ נָעֳמִ֣י <WH5281> Then Naomi חֲמוֹתָ֑הּ <WH2545> her mother in law בִּתִּ֞י <WH1323> unto her My daughter הֲלֹ֧א <WH3808> not אֲבַקֶּשׁ־ <WH1245> shall I not seek לָ֛ךְ מָנ֖וֹחַ <WH4494> rest אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that it יִֽיטַב־ <WH3190> for thee that it may be well לָֽךְ׃

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> is not בֹ֙עַז֙ <WH1162> And now [is] not Boaz מֹֽדַעְתָּ֔נוּ <WH4130> of our kindred אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose הָיִ֖ית <WH1961> become אֶת־ <WH854> for נַעֲרוֹתָ֑יו <WH5291> with whose maidens הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold ה֗וּא <WH1931> he זֹרֶ֛ה <WH2219> thou wast? Behold he winnoweth אֶת־ <WH853> גֹּ֥רֶן <WH1637> in the threshingfloor הַשְּׂעֹרִ֖ים <WH8184> barley הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> to night

וְרָחַ֣צְתְּ ׀ <WH7364> Wash וָסַ֗כְתְּ <WH5480> thyself therefore and anoint וְשַׂ֧מְתְּ <WH7760> thee and put [שִׂמְלֹתֵךְ כ] (שִׂמְלֹתַ֛יִךְ <WH8071> apparel ק) עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> and [וְיָרַדְתִּי כ] (וְיָרַ֣דְתְּ <WH3381> descend ק) הַגֹּ֑רֶן <WH1637> to the floor אַל־ <WH408> not תִּוָּדְעִ֣י <WH3045> [but] make not thyself known לָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> unto the man עַ֥ד <WH5704> until כַּלֹּת֖וֹ <WH3615> until he shall have done לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <WH398> eating וְלִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <WH8354> and drinking

וִיהִ֣י <WH1961> become בְשָׁכְב֗וֹ <WH7901> And it shall be when he lieth down וְיָדַ֙עַתְּ֙ <WH3045> that thou shalt mark אֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what יִשְׁכַּב־ <WH7901> where he shall lie שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> and you וּבָ֛את <WH935> and thou shalt go in וְגִלִּ֥ית <WH1540> and uncover מַרְגְּלֹתָ֖יו <WH4772> his feet [וְשָׁכָבְתִּי כ] (וְשָׁכָ֑בְתְּ <WH7901> down ק) וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he יַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> and he will tell לָ֔ךְ אֵ֖ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what תַּעַשִֽׂין׃ <WH6213> thee what thou shalt do

וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And she said אֵלֶ֑יהָ <WH413> to her כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> All אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you תֹּאמְרִ֥י <WH559> unto her All that thou sayest (אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about ק) אֶֽעֱשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> unto me I will do

וַתֵּ֖רֶד <WH3381> And she went down הַגֹּ֑רֶן <WH1637> unto the floor וַתַּ֕עַשׂ <WH6213> and did כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוַּ֖תָּה <WH6680> bade חֲמוֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH2545> according to all that her mother in law

וַיֹּ֨אכַל <WH398> had eaten בֹּ֤עַז <WH1162> And when Boaz וַיֵּשְׁתְּ֙ <WH8354> and drunk וַיִּיטַ֣ב <WH3190> was merry לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> and his heart וַיָּבֹ֕א <WH935> he went לִשְׁכַּ֖ב <WH7901> to lie down בִּקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> at the end הָעֲרֵמָ֑ה <WH6194> of the heap of corn וַתָּבֹ֣א <WH935> and she came בַלָּ֔ט <WH3909> softly וַתְּגַ֥ל <WH1540> and uncovered מַרְגְּלֹתָ֖יו <WH4772> his feet וַתִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <WH7901> and laid her down

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> happened בַּחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> the middle הַלַּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> of the night וַיֶּחֱרַ֥ד <WH2729> was afraid הָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> that the man וַיִּלָּפֵ֑ת <WH3943> and turned וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and behold אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> himself and behold a woman שֹׁכֶ֖בֶת <WH7901> lay מַרְגְּלֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4772> at his feet

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said מִי־ <WH4310> Who אָ֑תּ <WH859> and she וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> Who [art] thou? And she answered אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I ר֣וּת <WH7327> I [am] Ruth אֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <WH519> thine handmaid וּפָרַשְׂתָּ֤ <WH6566> spread כְנָפֶ֙ךָ֙ <WH3671> therefore thy skirt עַל־ <WH5921> over אֲמָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH519> over thine handmaid כִּ֥י <WH3588> are a גֹאֵ֖ל <WH1350> for thou [art] a near kinsman אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> he

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said בְּרוּכָ֨ה <WH1288> Blessed אַ֤תְּ <WH859> you לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3069> God בִּתִּ֔י <WH1323> my daughter הֵיטַ֛בְתְּ <WH3190> [for] thou hast shewed חַסְדֵּ֥ךְ <WH2617> more kindness הָאַחֲר֖וֹן <WH314> in the latter end מִן־ <WH4480> than הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> than at the beginning לְבִלְתִּי־ <WH1115> not לֶ֗כֶת <WH1980> going אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after הַבַּ֣חוּרִ֔ים <WH970> young men אִם־ <WH518> whether דַּ֖ל <WH1800> whether poor וְאִם־ <WH518> or עָשִֽׁיר׃ <WH6223> or rich

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now בִּתִּי֙ <WH1323> And now my daughter אַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <WH3372> fear כֹּ֥ל <WH3605> for all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you תֹּאמְרִ֖י <WH559> to thee all that thou requirest אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> not I will do לָּ֑ךְ כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יוֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <WH3045> doth know כָּל־ <WH3605> for all שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> for all the city עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> of my people כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> woman חַ֖יִל <WH2428> that thou [art] a virtuous אָֽתְּ׃ <WH859> you

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָמְנָ֔ם <WH551> And now it is true כִּ֥י <WH3588> for [אִם <WH518> lo כ] גֹאֵ֖ל <WH1350> that I [am thy] near kinsman אָנֹ֑כִי <WH595> I וְגַ֛ם <WH1571> however יֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> howbeit there is גֹּאֵ֖ל <WH1350> a kinsman קָר֥וֹב <WH7138> nearer מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> than

לִ֣ינִי ׀ <WH3885> Tarry הַלַּ֗יְלָה <WH3915> this night וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> comes בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> and it shall be in the morning אִם־ <WH518> if יִגְאָלֵ֥ךְ <WH1350> [that] if he will perform unto thee the part of a kinsman טוֹב֙ <WH2896> well יִגְאָ֔ל <WH1350> let him do the kinsman's part וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֨א <WH3808> does not יַחְפֹּ֧ץ <WH2654> but if he will לְגָֽאֳלֵ֛ךְ <WH1350> not do the part of a kinsman וּגְאַלְתִּ֥יךְ <WH1350> to thee then will I do the part of a kinsman אָנֹ֖כִי <WH595> I חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> to thee [as] the LORD שִׁכְבִ֖י <WH7901> lie down עַד־ <WH5704> until הַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> until the morning

וַתִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> And she lay [מַרְגְּלָתַו כ] (מַרְגְּלֹותָיו֙ <WH4772> feet ק) עַד־ <WH5704> until הַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> until the morning וַתָּ֕קָם <WH6965> and she rose up [בִּטְרֹום כ] (בְּטֶ֛רֶם <WH2958> before ק) יַכִּ֥יר <WH5234> could know אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> one אֶת־ <WH853> רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> another וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said אַל־ <WH408> nay יִוָּדַ֔ע <WH3045> Let it not be known כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָ֥אָה <WH935> came הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> that a woman הַגֹּֽרֶן׃ <WH1637> into the floor

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> Also he said הָ֠בִי <WH3051> Bring הַמִּטְפַּ֧חַת <WH4304> the vail אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that עָלַ֛יִךְ <WH5921> is on וְאֶֽחֳזִי־ <WH270> that [thou hast] upon thee and hold בָ֖הּ וַתֹּ֣אחֶז <WH270> it And when she held בָּ֑הּ וַיָּ֤מָד <WH4058> it he measured שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six שְׂעֹרִים֙ <WH8184> [measures] of barley וַיָּ֣שֶׁת <WH7896> and laid עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> [it] on her and she went הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> into the city

וַתָּבוֹא֙ <WH935> And when she came אֶל־ <WH413> to her חֲמוֹתָ֔הּ <WH2545> to her mother in law וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> she said מִי־ <WH4310> How אַ֣תְּ <WH859> you בִּתִּ֑י <WH1323> first וַתַּ֨גֶּד־ <WH5046> bewray לָ֔הּ אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> her all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after עָֽשָׂה־ <WH6213> had done לָ֖הּ הָאִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> her all that the man

וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And she said שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> These six הַשְּׂעֹרִ֥ים <WH8184> [measures] of barley הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These נָ֣תַן <WH5414> gave לִ֑י כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אָמַ֣ר <WH559> he me for he said (אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about ק) אַל־ <WH413> about תָּב֥וֹאִי <WH935> to me Go רֵיקָ֖ם <WH7387> not empty אֶל־ <WH408> nay חֲמוֹתֵֽךְ׃ <WH2545> unto thy mother in law

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> Then said שְׁבִ֣י <WH3427> she Sit still בִתִּ֔י <WH1323> my daughter עַ֚ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you תֵּֽדְעִ֔ין <WH3045> until thou know אֵ֖יךְ <WH349> how יִפֹּ֣ל <WH5307> will fall דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> how the matter כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> will not יִשְׁקֹט֙ <WH8252> will not be in rest הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> for the man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> until כִּלָּ֥ה <WH3615> he have finished הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> the thing הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> this day
